title: Yulu Bikes, Bajaj Auto to unveil third gen E-bike by year-end
description: Amit Gupta, co-founder and CEO, Yulu Bikes told ET, "The potential for growing micro-mobility services in India is massive. As much as 85% of the population today either does not have access to their own vehicle or does not own a driving licence. Our bikes are cost-effective, do not require a licence and are designed as a mobility solution to enhance livelihoods of commercial operators."
